sentences.sContent: He stated his views to me.
sentences.sCn: 他向我说明了他的观点。

sentences.sContent: ...and the paintings are now lodged deep in his autobiographical memories...
...he would start recording his whole life in detail...
...but the thrill of young love seems to have shifted a gear in his mind: from now on...
...Veiseh began to remember the details of his everyday experiences after he met his first young love...
...Bill often gets painful “flashbacks”，in which unwanted memories intrude into his consciousness...
...his face would get stuck when the winds changed...
...when he met his first girlfriend at his best friend's 16th birthday party...
...or even what side of the train he was sitting on his journey to work...
